# The curl extension

Configure the `curl` extension.

This extension provides support for using CURL - Client URL Library.

## PHP_EXT_CURL

* Default: `OFF`
* Values: `ON|OFF`

Enable the extension.

## PHP_EXT_CURL_SHARED

* Default: `OFF`
* Values: `ON|OFF`

Build extension as shared.
